status.description: Processing status of the request (success, error, or partial completion)

code.description: Error code identifier for programmatic handling

field.description: Specific field that triggered the error

severity.description: Error severity level (critical error or advisory warning)

errors.description: List of errors encountered during processing, null if no errors

company.description: Full legal company name without suffixes (unless part of common name)

start.description: Overall employment start date in 'MMM YYYY' format (or YYYY if only year mentioned)

end.description: Overall employment end date in 'MMM YYYY' format (null if current position)

current.description: Indicates if this is a current position (true) or past position (false)

summary.description: Concise overview of responsibilities (max 400 chars) relevant to target role

highlights.description: Key achievements (max 6, 200 chars each) with measurable impact and STAR format

title.description: Exact job title with standardized abbreviations

start.description: Role-specific start date in 'MMM YYYY' format (or YYYY if only year mentioned)

end.description: Role-specific end date in 'MMM YYYY' format (null if current role)

current.description: Indicates if this specific role is current (true) or past (false)

roles.description: All positions held at this company with individual dates

strengths.description: Effective aspects of the role description

areas_to_improve.description: Suggestions to enhance role relevance to target position

feedback.description: Evaluation of role description quality and alignment with target position

data.description: Container for optimized work experience and evaluation feedback
